0:
SELECT Currency, COUNT(*) AS NumberOfCustomers 
FROM customers 
WHERE Currency IN ('EUR', 'CZK') 
GROUP BY Currency;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
1: SELECT Date, Consumption FROM yearmonth WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM yearmonth WHERE YEAR(Date) = 2012 AND CustomerID = 'LAM');	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
2:
SELECT ym.CustomerID, SUM(ym.Consumption) AS MonthlyConsumption
FROM yearmonth ym
JOIN customers c ON ym.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
WHERE c.Segment = 'SME' AND YEAR(ym.Date) = 2013
GROUP BY ym.CustomerID;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
3:
SELECT c.Currency, SUM(ym.Consumption) AS TotalConsumption
FROM yearmonth ym
JOIN customers c ON ym.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
WHERE ym.Date BETWEEN '2012-01-01' AND '2012-12-31'
AND c.Currency IN ('CZK', 'EUR')
GROUP BY c.Currency;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
4: The table structure information provided is not enough to generate sql queries.	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
5:
SELECT y.CustomerID, SUM(y.Consumption) AS TotalConsumption
FROM yearmonth y
JOIN customers c ON y.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
WHERE c.Segment = 'SME' AND YEAR(y.Date) = 2013
GROUP BY y.CustomerID;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
6:
SELECT customers.Segment, AVG(yearmonth.Consumption) AS AnnualAverageConsumption
FROM yearmonth
JOIN customers ON yearmonth.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID
WHERE YEAR(yearmonth.Date) = 2013
GROUP BY customers.Segment
ORDER BY AnnualAverageConsumption ASC
LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
7:
SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(Date) = 2013 AND Currency = 'EUR' AND Segment IN ('SME', 'LAM', 'KAM') THEN Consumption ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(Date) = 2012 AND Currency = 'EUR' AND Segment IN ('SME', 'LAM', 'KAM') THEN Consumption ELSE 0 END)) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(Date) = 2012 AND Currency = 'EUR' AND Segment IN ('SME', 'LAM', 'KAM') THEN Consumption ELSE 0 END), 0) * 100 AS PercentageIncrease
FROM yearmonth
JOIN customers ON yearmonth.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID
WHERE YEAR(Date) IN (2012, 2013) AND Currency = 'EUR' AND Segment IN ('SME', 'LAM', 'KAM');	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
8:
SELECT SUM(Consumption) AS TotalConsumption 
FROM yearmonth 
WHERE CustomerID = 6 AND Date BETWEEN '2013-08-01' AND '2013-11-30';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
9: SELECT COUNT(*) AS number_of_discount_stations FROM gasstations WHERE Country IN ('Czech Republic', 'Slovakia') AND Segment = 'Discount';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
10:
SELECT c.Currency
FROM customers c
JOIN loan l ON c.CustomerID = l.account_id
WHERE c.Segment = 'SME' AND l.account_id IN (
    SELECT DISTINCT account_id
    FROM order
    WHERE bank_to = 'Czech Republic'
);	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
11:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalLAMCustomers,
       SUM(CASE WHEN TotalConsumption > 46.73 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LAMCustomersAboveThreshold
FROM (
    SELECT CustomerID, SUM(Consumption) AS TotalConsumption
    FROM yearmonth
    GROUP BY CustomerID
) AS ConsumptionSummary;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
12:
SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) / (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) FROM yearmonth WHERE Date >= '2012-02-01' AND Date < '2012-03-01')) * 100 AS Percentage
FROM yearmonth
WHERE Date >= '2012-02-01' AND Date < '2012-03-01' AND Consumption > 528.3;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
13: SELECT Date, Consumption FROM yearmonth WHERE YEAR(Date) = 2012;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
14:
SELECT DISTINCT p.Description 
FROM products p 
JOIN transactions_1k t ON p.ProductID = t.ProductID 
JOIN yearmonth y ON t.CustomerID = y.CustomerID 
WHERE y.Date BETWEEN '2013-09-01' AND '2013-09-30';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
15:
SELECT DISTINCT c.name AS Country 
FROM transactions_1k t 
JOIN gasstations g ON t.GasStationID = g.GasStationID 
JOIN Country c ON g.Country = c.id 
WHERE t.Date BETWEEN '2013-06-01' AND '2013-06-30';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
16:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.CustomerID) AS NumberOfCustomers
FROM customers c
JOIN yearmonth ym ON c.CustomerID = ym.CustomerID
WHERE c.Currency = 'euro' AND ym.Consumption > 1000;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
17:
SELECT DISTINCT p.Description 
FROM transactions_1k t 
JOIN gasstations g ON t.GasStationID = g.GasStationID 
JOIN products p ON t.ProductID = p.ProductID 
WHERE g.Country = 'Czech Republic';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
18:
SELECT t.Date, t.Time 
FROM transactions_1k t 
JOIN gasstations g ON t.GasStationID = g.GasStationID 
WHERE g.ChainID = 11;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
19:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS number_of_transactions 
FROM transactions_1k t 
JOIN gasstations g ON t.GasStationID = g.GasStationID 
WHERE g.Country = 'Czech Republic' AND t.Date > '2012-01-01';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
20:
SELECT c.Currency
FROM transactions_1k t
JOIN customers c ON t.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
WHERE t.Time = '16:25:00' AND t.Date = '2012-08-24';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
21:
SELECT c.CustomerID, c.Segment 
FROM customers c 
JOIN transactions_1k t ON c.CustomerID = t.CustomerID 
WHERE t.Date = '2012-08-23' AND t.Time = '21:20:00';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
22: SELECT * FROM transactions_1k WHERE Date = '2012-08-26' AND Time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '09:00:00' AND GasStationID IN (SELECT GasStationID FROM district WHERE A2 = 'CZE');	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
23: SELECT customers.Currency FROM transactions_1k INNER JOIN yearmonth ON transactions_1k.CustomerID = yearmonth.CustomerID WHERE yearmonth.Date = '2012-08-24' AND transactions_1k.Amount = 548.4;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
24:
SELECT COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers) AS PercentCustomersUsingEUR
FROM transactions_1k t
JOIN customers c ON t.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
WHERE c.Currency = 'EUR' AND t.Date = '2012-08-25';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
25:
SELECT y.CustomerID, y.Date, y.Consumption
FROM yearmonth AS y
JOIN transactions_1k AS t ON y.CustomerID = t.CustomerID
WHERE t.Amount = 634.8 
AND t.Date = '2012-08-25'
AND (YEAR(y.Date) = 2012 OR YEAR(y.Date) = 2013);	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing

27:
SELECT SUM(Amount) AS TotalSpent 
FROM transactions_1k 
WHERE CustomerID = '38508';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
28: SELECT CustomerID, SUM(Amount) AS TotalSpent FROM transactions_1k GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
29:
SELECT CustomerID, SUM(Amount) AS TotalAmount, SUM(Consumption) AS TotalConsumption 
FROM transactions_1k t 
JOIN yearmonth y ON t.CustomerID = y.CustomerID 
WHERE t.Price > 29.00 
AND t.ProductID = 5 
AND y.Date BETWEEN '2012-08-01' AND '2012-08-31' 
GROUP BY t.CustomerID;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
